name: OpenFunnel
long_description:
Developers have scattered yet heavy touch-points that represent adoption and buying intent across social channels.

We help GTM teams at dev-tooling companies identify and engage with developers who are in the market for their product. Our AI agents thoroughly understand your dev-tool, scan developer channels, analyze interactions, and alert you about strong developer leads and engagement signals.
one_liner: OpenFunnel is building GTM Agents for Devtool companies
